summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; reducing and revising revenue estimates and reducing expenditure allowances in the 1996 Budget of the Woodland Park Zoo Division of the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing increases in 1996 Zoo Annual Pass fees, amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 18.28.010 in connection therewith, abrogating certain vacant positions at the zoo, and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
